name: TagmaQuest Endoscopy
summary: This VR multiplayer simulation was created by Tagmavisions for lumbar endoscopy training. The app is under development in collaboration with University of São Paulo Endoscopy Specialization Course. Medical image reconstructions were included in the virtual environment and the main activities were included for puncture and approach training. A multi player environment offers conditions for real time interaction and case discussions. Funding by FAPESP (2020/05306-4). Obs: Any off-platform monetization of...
